document_data.name: Coalition
document_data.mainbody: The '''Coalition''' was a temporary alliance formed between the armed forces of [[Waterdeep]], [[Baldur's Gate]], and [[Daggerford]] to combat the growing threat of the [[Shining Crusade]].
document_data.Organization: The Coalition army was led by three generals, each representing one of the three member-cities. [[Cedric deLancie|Torsin Cedric deLancie]] commanded the [[Waterdhavian]] [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|guardsmen]], [[Kyrill Nederlok|Marshal Kyrill Nederlok]] led the mercenaries of the [[Flaming Fist]], and [[Haither Stonehand|General Haither Stonehand]] directed the militiamen of Daggerford.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Coalition formed their war camp at a location near [[Dead Man's Pass]], some ways north of the [[Winding Water]].

Members.Notable Members:
* [[Simonetta Twoedged]], a military consultant from Waterdeep
* [[Halasan|Vigilant Halasan]], a drill instructor responsible for training new recruits
* [[Theodosia Immartyred]], a [[cleric]] of [[Ilmater]]  that served as the Coalition's lead healer
* [[Belegarm]], the Coalition logistician and provisioner of the Flaming Fist
* [[Mizhena]], a devout warrior of [[Tempus]]
